text: Evžen Neustupný (born 1933 in Prague, Czech Republic) is a Czech archaeologist, educated at the Charles University.Claire Smith (editor),"Encyclopedia of Global Archaeology", Springer, 2014. (link). He is an author of numerous publications, e.g.Evzen Neustupny, "Archaeological Method", Cambridge University Press, Aug 26, 1993. . Evžen is a son of archaeologist and museologist Jiří Neustupný. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Czech archaeologists Category:Charles University alumni
title: Evžen Neustupný
